content.title: Gabatarwar HTML
content.value:
HTML tana nufin HyperText Markup Language. Ita ce harshen da ake amfani da shi wajen ƙirƙirar shafukan yanar gizo. 
 HTML tana bayyana tsarin shafi ta amfani da alamu. 
 Tana da jerin abubuwa da ke nuna wa mai bincike yadda za a nuna abun ciki.

content.title: Me Yasa Ake Amfani da HTML?
Takardun HTML
content.value:
HTML tana da muhimmanci wajen haɓaka yanar gizo. Tana ba ka damar ƙirƙirar takardu masu tsari waɗanda za a iya nuna su a cikin masu bincike. 

Tare da HTML, za ka iya:
- Ƙirƙirar kanun labarai, sakin layi, hanyoyin haɗi, hotuna, da sauran abubuwa
- Tsara abun ciki ta amfani da jerin abubuwa da tebura
- Hada abubuwan multimedia kamar bidiyo da sauti
- Ƙirƙirar fom don shigarwar mai amfani

content.title: Bayani Kan Misalin
content.value: Sanarwar tana nuna cewa wannan takaddar HTML5 ce. Abun shine tushen shafi na HTML. Abun yana ɗauke da bayanai na meta game da shafin HTML. Abun yana nuna taken shafin HTML (ana nuna shi a sandar taken mai bincike ko a tab na shafi). Abun <body> yana bayyana jikin takaddar, kuma shi ne akwati ga duk abubuwan da ake gani, kamar kanun labarai, sakin layi, hotuna, hanyoyin haɗi, tebura, jerin abubuwa, da sauransu. Abun <h1> yana nuna babban kanun labarai. Abun <p> yana nuna sakin layi.

content.title: Takardun HTML
content.value:
Dukkan takardun HTML dole ne su fara da sanarwar nau'in takaddar: <!DOCTYPE html>.
Takaddar HTML kanta tana farawa da <html> kuma tana ƙarewa da </html>.
Sashen da ake gani na takaddar HTML yana tsakanin <body> da </body>.

CSS tana adana aiki mai yawa. Tana iya sarrafa tsarin shafuka da dama na yanar gizo lokaci guda.

content.title: Menene CSS?
content.value: CSS tana nufin Cascading Style Sheets. Tare da CSS, za ka iya sarrafa launi, font, girman rubutu, tazara tsakanin abubuwa, yadda abubuwa suke tsaye da tsara su, hotunan baya ko launuka da za a yi amfani da su, daban-daban nunawa ga na’urori da girman allo, da sauran abubuwa da yawa!

content.title: Amfani da CSS
content.value:
Ana iya ƙara CSS ga takardun HTML ta hanyoyi guda 3:
- Inline - ta amfani da siffofin style a cikin abubuwan HTML
- Internal - ta amfani da <style> a cikin <head>
- External - ta amfani da <link> don haɗa fayil ɗin CSS na waje
Hanyar da aka fi amfani da ita ita ce ajiyar salon a fayilolin CSS na waje. Amma a wannan darasin za mu yi amfani da inline da internal styles, saboda yana da sauƙin nuna misalai da kuma gwadawa.

content.value:
Hanyoyin HTML suna nufin hyperlinks.
Za ka iya danna hanyar kuma ka wuce zuwa wani takarda.

content.title: Hanyoyin HTML - Siffar Target
content.value:
A asali, shafin da aka haɗa zai bayyana a taga na yanzu na browser. Don canza wannan, dole ne ka bayyana wani target daban don hanyar.
Asalin ƙima shine _self, wanda ke nufin takardar da aka haɗa za ta buɗe a cikin wannan taga/tab ɗin da aka danna.

Sauran ƙima don siffar target sun haɗa da:
- _blank: Buɗe takardar a sabon taga ko tab
- _parent: Buɗe takardar a frame na uwa
- _top: Buɗe takardar a cikakken jikin taga

content.title: Hotunan HTML - Alamar
content.value: A HTML, hotuna ana bayyana su ta alamar . Alamar babu komai a ciki, tana ɗauke da siffofi kawai, ba ta da tag ɗin rufe.

Alamar HTML tana amfani don saka hoto a shafin yanar gizo. Hotuna ba a saka su kai tsaye a shafi ba; ana haɗa hotuna zuwa shafukan yanar gizo. Alamar tana ƙirƙirar wuri don hoton da aka ambata. Alamar babu komai a ciki, tana ɗauke da siffofi kawai, ba ta da tag ɗin rufe. Alamar tana da siffofi guda biyu da ake buƙata: src - nuna hanyar hoton alt - rubutu madadin don hoton

content.value: Siffar src tana nuna hanyar zuwa hoton da za a nuna.

content.title: Maballin HTML - Tag <button>
content.value:
A HTML, maballin ana ƙirƙirarsa da tag <button>.
Tag <button> na iya ɗaukar rubutu ko hoto, kuma yana da tag rufe.

Tag <button> yana ƙirƙirar maballin da za a iya danna.
Tag <button> na iya ɗaukar rubutu ko hoto, kuma yana da tag rufe.
Tag <button> na iya ɗaukar halaye kamar type, onclick, da disabled.

content.title: Maballin HTML - Misali
content.value: Ga misali na maballin HTML mai sauƙi:

content.title: Misali
content.value: <button type="button">Danna Ni!</button>

content.title: Nau'ikan Maballin HTML
content.value:
Halaye type yana nuna nau'in maballin. Zaɓuɓɓukan sune:
- button: Maballin da za a iya danna (default)
- submit: Maballin da ke aika fom
- reset: Maballin da ke sake saita fom

content.title: Misali
content.value:
<button type="button">Danna Ni!</button>
<button type="submit">Aika</button>
<button type="reset">Sake Saita</button>

content.title: Maballin HTML - Aikin Onclick
content.value: Halaye onclick yana nuna aikin JavaScript da za a aiwatar lokacin da aka danna maballin.

content.title: Misali
content.value: <button type="button" onclick="alert('An Danna Maballin!')">Danna Ni!</button>

Manyan tags sune <table>, <tr> (layin jadawali), <td> (bayanan jadawali), da <th> (kanun jadawali).

content.value: HTML na iya saka abubuwan multimedia kamar bidiyo da sauti cikin shafukan yanar gizo.

content.title: Tag na <video>
content.value: Ana amfani da tag na <video> don saka bidiyo a shafin yanar gizo. Za'a iya saita girman bidiyo da kuma kunna shi ta atomatik.

content.title: Misali
content.value:
<video width="320" height="240" controls>
  <source src="movie.mp4" type="video/mp4">
  Browser dinka baya goyon bayan bidiyo.
</video>

content.title: Tag na <audio>
content.value: Ana amfani da tag na <audio> don saka sauti a shafin yanar gizo. Za'a iya kunna sautin kai tsaye ko kuma a kula da shi da mai amfani.

content.title: Misali
content.value:
<audio controls>
  <source src="audio.mp3" type="audio/mpeg">
  Browser dinka baya goyon bayan sauti.
</audio>
